name: Sports Meeting - Archery,Diving, Weight Lifting...
description: Play as athletes in training and aim to be champions in Rio Olympic 2016! A lot of funs awaits you! With eight sport competitions and each's minigames, you will find that a path to be a champion is not easy. But with a lot of practice and determine wits, you will break your the limit and becoma a champion eventually. So don't give up! Make your own chance and become a true champion!
